# False
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel FALSE(): Set the logical value to FALSE. The FALSE() function does not require any arguments.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `FALSE`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
